title: Championship ashe, when do the missions start?
body: I see that she has been released, but what about the missions, when do they start?

replies.body: The missions haven't been added quite yet, but those should be coming with the World's patch soon!
when is the championship ashe leaving the store i want to make sure i get her before she leaves but i just want to know when she wont be available

Why are my missions stuck? It says complete 4 more mission and i have no more missions to do
quite frustrating considering i payed 1300RP for the missions pass
I would love to have some clarification as well. Is it week based like every friday or something? or is there something wrong with my account?
I believe the new missions come out every Monday as for 6 weeks, those who have the World's Pass will get additional missions as well as the general ones everyone gets

"Why are my missions stuck? It says complete 4 more mission and i have no more missions to do
quite frustrating considering i payed 1300RP for the missions pass" 
- Bape Sharks 

I feel the same way... I have been waiting for a week now. I bought the pass like last Thursday, its been a week we finished all the missions on the first day, and we have been waiting. Where are the second set of missions?
